results.content: This course was great!  I've been learning Full stack web dev and felt like I needed just a little more experience with JavaScript and JQuery and this was it.  I took off half of a star because the last two projects weren't available and a lot of the videos were off in the JavaScript section so I didn't receive much practice since I started getting confused with titles and videos.  GREAT WORK!
results.content_html: This course was great! I've been learning Full stack web dev and felt like I needed just a little more experience with JavaScript and JQuery and this was it. I took off half of a star because the last two projects weren't available and a lot of the videos were off in the JavaScript section so I didn't receive much practice since I started getting confused with titles and videos. GREAT WORK!
